name: Ultimate TicTacToe
description:
Ultimate Tic Tac Toe is my first game published to itch.io and was made to learn more about the Unity game engine.

You can read more about the rules of Ultimate Tic Tac Toe at Ben Orlin's blog here: https://mathwithbaddrawings.com/2013/06/16/ultimate-tic-tac-toe/

This game has an AI implemented using the Monte Carlo Tree Search algorithm.
